C.2 Workflow Config Trust Boundary
1. Try pushing workflow changes with limited token
 	- You need workflow PAT scope
	- Workflow Files are protected

WIth a wrong token, push was rejected, error indicated missing workflow scope and changes were blocked.

- Github treats workflow configuration as a higher-trust asset than normal code. CI config is priviledged control plane, not application code.

Reason: CI workflow files are like root access to your filesystem, a place where secrets are injected, engine of your pipeline.
